title: Add Viper Elite gaming mouse to mice product category

requirements.text: Add a new Viper Elite gaming mouse product entry to the mice array in frontend/src/data/products.ts with complete specifications including name, price, description, and gaming-relevant specs (DPI range, polling rate, sensor type, weight, connectivity, etc.) following the existing product data structure
acceptanceCriteria: A new product object for Viper Elite mouse is added to the mice array
Product includes all standard fields: name, price, description, image, specs
Specifications include gaming-relevant details like DPI, polling rate, sensor, weight
Product data follows the same structure and format as existing mice products
The new mouse appears in the Mice section on the homepage

constraints: Follow the existing Product interface structure defined in frontend/src/data/products.ts
Maintain consistency with existing mouse product specifications format
nonGoals: Creating new UI components or layouts
Modifying the ProductCard or ProductCategorySection components
Adding backend functionality or data persistence
